title: How to avoid being matced with unskilled players
body:
as the title suggests, I would like to know what I can do to avoid being matched with unskilled players? 
I am matched with too many people who dont even know what champions do and I cant climb the ladder because people simply dont care about winning.

replies.body:
Hey dude,

Give this video a watch and let me know what you think. Just remember everyone in your game has around the same skill level. The players on your team and your opponents team are pulled from the same pool of players.

https://youtu.be/5MTO2a7ZFcc

The worst the players are at your elo, the higher chance you have of winning. It's cold hard maths.

So in the short, the only 'real' answer here is. Get better, and then you will get matched with better players.
theres nothing you can do welcome to LOL {{champion:106}}
Welcome to the wonderful world of AOL!
